GSD.description:
scsi: libfc: Fix use after free in fc_exch_abts_resp()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit f581df412bc45c95176e3c808ee2839c05b2ab0c. For more details please see the references link.
